item.title: Commands
item.dc:creator: @killernoob3 killernoob3
item.description:

ill give some commands

 sendMessage("USE THESE MOTHER FUCKER WISELY!!!.");  
      }

                        {
                        String victim = command.substring(8);
			PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim;
                        System.out.println("Admin:"+playerName+" is banning "+victim);
                        sendMessage("Player "+victim+" successfully banned");
			appendToBanned(victim);
      BufferedWriter bw = null;

      try {
         bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("logs/banlogs.txt", true));
	 bw.write(playerName+" banned"+victim);
	 bw.newLine();
	 bw.flush();
      } catch (IOException ioe) {
	 ioe.printStackTrace();
      } finally {
	 if (bw != null) try {
	    bw.close();
	 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
	    sendMessage("Error logging bans!");
	 }
      }

      try {
         bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("C:/Documents and Settings/sander van't Veer/Bureaublad/MoparScape/eragonscape/logs/banlogs.txt", true));
	 bw.write(playerName+" banned"+victim);

	    sendMessage("Error logging bans!");
	 }
      }
}

commands are located in client.java hsould look like this

public void logout(){
		outStream.createFrame(109);
	}

	public void customCommand(String command) {
		actionAmount++;

command.replaceAll("no-ip", "imgay");
command.replaceAll("servegame", "imgay");
command.trim();

item.title: Commands
item.dc:creator: @alvaroboldo alvaroboldo
item.description:
@alvaroboldo wrote:

Use this for a teleport command

		else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("commandname")
	{
		teleportToX = ####;
		teleportToY = ####;
	}

and this one for item command

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("commandname"))
{
sendMessage("Menssage");
addItem(item ID,Amout);
}

you can add more

addItem(item ID,Amout);

if you want

both you can add above ::master or any command

Read full topic
